description: Distributed systems investment collective VentureDAO

description: AntidoteDAO is a non-profit Web3 DAO dedicated to funding cancer research.
dao_mission: Companies are extremely centralised in traditional business structures, and investors have little input in the destiny of those organisations. Typical charities have large administrative fees and don't let you choose what your money goes to. Investors will have equal governance in how Antidote operates and what we fund as we transition to a DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) framework. We'll start with a more centralised structure and gradually decentralise as time goes on. DAOs aren't just businesses; they're also communities. Blockchain technology allows for a higher level of collaboration and communication. In the field of cancer research, we have the potential to be more successful and have a greater impact than any typical charity. Our purpose isn't to support other NGOs, but to strategically locate them in order to raise awareness of what we're doing. Our ultimate goal is to provide seed funding for new research that does not have access to other sources of funding.

description: Supporting open finance and a tokenized economy that is decentralised
dao_mission: BitDAO wants to leverage its financial and human capital to promote and invest in DeFi innovation, collaboration, and growth.
dao_about: BitDAO is a decentralised autonomous organisation (DAO) with billions in existing assets and billions in expected contributions. BitDAO aims to assist those who are working to create a decentralised economy. It's a public platform where BIT token holders can vote on proposals. It is unconcerned about chains or projects. Direct partnerships or swaps with project expansion via specialised autonomous entities such as ecosystem funds, artist guilds, farming cooperatives, R&D Labs, and so on are examples of possible proposals. Peter Thiel, Founders Fund, Pantera, Dragonfly, Spartan, Bybit, and others have all backed BitDAO. Our mission statements are to support decentralised economy builders and to demonstrate the potential of DAOs. To encourage a diverse range of ideas and to test a wide range of economic alignment, governance, treasury management, and organisational options. Our Core Values With fractal expansion, become the largest decentralised autonomous network of entities. Create and collaborate with specialised autonomous entities for ecosystem funds, art, farming, research and development, venture capital, events, grants, education, and DAO operations services, among other things. Encourage autonomous entities to create and collaborate with other autonomous entities, allowing for fractal growth. Collaboration with existing projects is possible through token swaps and other means. Find ways to avoid the top-level BitDAO governance process bottlenecking micro-decisions. BitDAO governance should be limited to mandate and funding approval. Allow your partners to be self-sufficient. R&D, liquidity, funding, and operational support are all used to help partners become category leaders. Attract potential builders by aligning incentives. Make it as simple as possible to create and operate autonomous entities. Concentrate on executing ideas quickly. Encourage a lot of trial and error with temporary solutions based on policy, trust, and risk management mechanics. Iterate on a long-term solution that includes governance and treasury management technology. Find a way to link the BIT value to the entire ecosystem. Treat proposals as synergistic, but also as a bargaining opportunity.

description: Using sophisticated bonding curves to create deep on-chain liquidity
dao_mission: Curve DAO is the Curve Protocol's DAO in charge of protocol governance and value accrual. Curve's major purpose is to allow users and other decentralised protocols to convert stablecoins (for example, DAI to USDC) with minimal fees and low slippage through it. Curve's activity differs from that of other exchanges that connect buyers and sellers; it leverages liquidity pools like Uniswap. Curve requires liquidity (tokens) to accomplish this, and those who offer it are rewarded. The Curve developers do not have access to your tokens because they are non-custodial. The Curve DAO token's major goals are to incentivize liquidity providers on the Curve Finance platform and to involve as many users as possible in the protocol's governance. The Curve DAO uses a token ($CRV) for both governance and value accrual. $CRV is currently used for three purposes: voting, staking, and boosting. These three activities will need locking your $CRV and obtaining $veCRV.

dao_about: MODA DAO is a decentralised technological community and network. MODA is committed to the adoption of Web3 in the music business via NFTs, micro-licensing, DAO governance, and DeFi, and is designed for the metaverse and the play-to-earn age.

description: Internet Museum
dao_about: MUSE0 is focused on community, support, and charity, rather than on profit. NFTs will be collected, but not sold. MUSE0 will not only exist in the digital world and numerous metaverses, but it will also, ideally, develop a physical presence over time.

description: The first interactive web3 dating show with community
dao_mission: Creating the first web3 interactive TV channel, starting with a dating show anyone can participate in.

description: Better, smarter currency available to anyone, anywhere, anytime
dao_about: MakerDAO is the creator of Dai, the world's first unbiased currency and leading decentralized stablecoin. Dai offers financial freedom without volatility, decentralized governance, and integrations with a growing ecosystem of DeFi solutions.

description: Decentralize access to space.
dao_about:
Rather than have the moon and other celestial bodies lie in the hands of a few private organizations (SpaceX, Blue Origin), we believe that an international, decentralized, inclusive, and transparent organization would be more equitable and fair.
We do not believe in "emperors of the moon" or "CEOs of space," but instead we believe in extending the unalienable rights of citizens of planet earth to the solar system and beyond

description: DAO creator platform leveraging DeFi yield strategies to fund creators and operations
dao_mission:
Society already has the collective compassion, knowledge and resources to solve the world�s problems. The missing piece is a technology to bring it all together. 
Movement DAO uses proven applications of blockchain to align economic incentives within communities and empower them to solve problems as a collective. 
Movement DAO's mission is to change the world for the better and become the launchpad for the world's most impactful movements! 
Movement DAO enables communities to run programmable and community funded treasuries by providing tooling and a seeded endowment.

description: Generative art platform + DAO built by artists, for artists
dao_mission: mxtter DAO is the community and DAO where artists are pushing the boundaries of generative art. Each mxtter drop consists of 14 days of 1-of-1 auctions followed by a limited edition public sale. 50% of the funds from the auctions will support up & coming artists and build the DAO's collection.

description: A for-profit DAO for the metaverse
dao_about: Support and build out the vision of the metaverse. The future of the internet is infinite-scalable virtual worlds with their own architecture, avatars, events and more�all supporting their own economy and digital identities. NEON is a collective to support this growing ecosystem.

description: An experimental community that aims to build a new method of connecting investors and founders for collaboration.
dao_about: An experimental community that aims to build a new method of investors and founders collaboration. Nonamers can share and propose their knowledge of profitable investment options which the whole community can profit from using its large accumulated funds once DAO decides to approve it.

description: Liquidity and staking DAO for decentralised derivatives
To buy a national rain forest to preserve the environment
A liquidity DAO for scaled yield

description: The Decentralised Autonomous Organisation of Nectar
dao_about: Philanthropists on a mission to nurture the NFT ecosystem, by providing funding to quality projects

description: Nectar ($NEC) is a token governed by a DAO.

description: NFT Collection

dao_mission:
Nil is a community-curated marketplace looking to harmonize the relationship between the creator economy participants.
We are a cooperative of hackers & painters looking to collectively establish the decentralized foundations on which the creator economy will thrive

description: Link Community to Web3.0.
dao_mission: For the new and increasing Web 3.0 communities, Nutbox delivers out-of-the-box functionality for constructing a contemporary DAO in a matter of minutes. We want to build a web3.0 environment that connects users, communities, and protocols to enable seamless involvement.

description: Tools for the Web3 Data Economy
dao_mission: A decentralized data exchange protocol, powered by blockchain technology and cryptotoken. Connecting providers and consumers of valuable data, while providing open access for developers to build services.

description: Free web3 learning guides
dao_mission: We're on a mission to onboard 1M people to web3. Get started on our FREE web3 learning guides & get a quality web3 education

description: Decentralized reserve currency

description: Y Combinator crypto society
dao_mission: Supporting past, present, and aspiring Y Combinator founders who are building the future of the crypto ecosystem. We will distribute: wealth, knowledge, access to power, control over resources, and participation in governance.

description: Earn crypto by contributing to open source
dao_about: Open source DAO is a community that aims to promote open source contribution by rewarding contributors with cryptocurrency tokens.

description: leveling the playing field for both creators and collectors
The autonomous research community
dao_mission:
We're a group of open scientific activists, academics, organisers, and fans who have banded together to address the current concerns of data sharing, reproducibility, incentive alignment, coordination, and intellectual ownership.
We're working together to create a scientific environment that breaks down data barriers, facilitates cooperation, and democratises financing. Our long-term goal is to build a worldwide network of automated knowledge foundries where scientists and artificial intelligence collaborate to develop new knowledge.

dao_about: PartyDAO's product PartyBid lets people pool their capital together to purchase NFTs as a team. Anyone can create or join a Party to collectively bid in an NFT auction or purchase an NFT that�s on sale at a fixed price.

description: Decentralized market-weighted portfolio allocations
dao_mission: PieDAO is a decentralised asset manager for tokenized portfolios with the goal of making automatic wealth creation accessible to anybody with an internet connection. Pies are diversified portfolios of top-performing crypto assets with active yield generation to optimise rewards.

description: 10,000 unique on-chain avatar NFTs using cellular automation.

description: A cartel of $PEEPS who aim to plz

description: Break the web2's grip on human resources and information.
dao_mission: PandaDAO aims to decentralise information control from centralised organisations and instead place personal data in the hands of individuals. We also want to create DAO tools so that more people may work full-time for this new sort of organisation. PandaDAO is much more than a decentralised media platform. We're working on new decentralised data systems and releasing Web2 products and human resources.

description: The community for exploring ideas in crypto
dao_mission:
Explores building new products and utility for PAR via community driven proposals and governance
Parachute launches to create community, explore ideas in crytpo 
As an early community, Parachute explores ideas such as freelancing, mining, bounties, and community events on blockchain. 
Parachute grows and creates several subsets and offshoot communities to explore ideas, products, and directions to dedicate energy. 
Parachute transitions to a full DAO, where governance, direction, and new products are created by and for the community. 
The Parachute DAO will participate in votes to decide managers, shape governance mechanisms, and decide sprints for shaping the future of Parachute.

description: Paving the road to the metaverse
dao_mission: PathDAO is paving the way for a new era of blockchain gaming and metaverse ecosystems based on play-to-earn incentives. The DAO develops communities in the multiverse of games and offers play-to-earn scholarships. With several projects, it is attempting to create value for players, producers, and investors.

description: Decentralized organization building the future of work in the metaverse

description: Purpose + people + DAO = ProsperDao ?

description: People DAO arose from a watershed moment in Web3 that symbolised the potential of human cooperation: the adoption of the US Constitution.
dao_mission:
MissionPeopleDAO is a MetaDAO, a DAO of DAOs that incubates, supports, and funds other DAOs with web3 and social good goals.
As a governance token, They use $PEOPLE. We are dedicated to designing, funding, and supporting DAOs and Projects.
dao_about: ValuesServe: Promote web3 by creating content and hosting sub-DAOs that deliver public goods. Incubate: Through technical support and finance, develop subDAOs. Steward: Honor the tale of the $PEOPLE token and craft the next chapter through culture-making.

description: Buy NFTs together
dao_about: PartyDAO's product PartyBid lets people pool their capital together to purchase NFTs as a team. Anyone can create or join a Party to collectively bid in an NFT auction or purchase an NFT that�s on sale at a fixed price.

description: An Adoption Engine for Open Finance
dao_mission: Building tools that turn DeFi into a cooperative ecosystem. DAOs are growing in power but remain isolated digital organisations. PrimeDAO creates next-generation coordination tools to connect them - built the DAO native way.

description: connects users to the QiDao Protocol, which is where the vaults are created and stablecoins are borrowed.
dao_mission: They devised a method for us to store your cryptocurrency while still being able to spend its worth. People can borrow stable coins without selling our crypto assets, and we can do it at 0% interest!

description: Creators of $MAI, the leading stablecoin on Polygon
dao_mission: $MAI (miMatic), Polygon's native stablecoin, was created by QiDAO Protocol. Users can borrow MAI stable currency at 0% interest in MAI Finance without selling any crypto. MAI is soft-pegged to the US dollar, meaning its price moves in lockstep with the US dollar.

description: A community 1st approach to RealEstate Tokenization
dao_about: They build�Passive Income for Everyone through RealEstateOwnership. Through $RETOKEN, a 3winDAO ecosystem DAO and tokenized #web3 community is owned and operated.

description: community-centric NFT marketplace.
The greatest photography community in web3

RAW is a decentralised autonomous organisation (DAO) founded on Ethereum's mainnet with the goal of developing new ways to organise, collect, and promote NFT photographs.
It began as a Fingerprints DAO incubator and has now grown into its own community.

description: A DAO for digital fashion
dao_mission: Red DAO aims to bring together people interested in supporting the growing digital fashion ecosystem. Red DAO will support, purchase, archive, collect, invest in items, and digital garments in the world of digital wearables and fashion.

description: A grand strategy crypto RPG
dao_mission: Game money (sROME) backed by the Bank of Rome is being implemented by Houses of Rome to create the first true crypto RPG. Weapons, armour, potions, and tools as player-owned NFTs Marketplace for players to trade goods, characters, and materials Battles/raids that reward players with NFT items as loot Houses that work together to develop, manage, and play in a 3D landscape that feels and plays like a genuine game environment on both desktop and mobile

description: A #NFT Club that introduces amazing Latin American artistic style.
dao_mission: Samot Club is an interdisciplinary collective that goes beyond the digital realm's binary. We are a motley crew of artists, designers, developers, architects, and economists who all share the idea of creating a club for people, by people.

description: DAO owned, capital efficient stablecoin

StableUnit (suDAO) is a simple, secure, and non-custodial solution for anyone to access digital assets. It's yours to keep in your wallet, where it will hold its value against inflation while also earning you money.
All without having to take out your wallet.

description: Defi for everyone, defi forever
dao_mission: Aims to develop a one-stop-shop for DeFi, eventually allowing anyone � with any level of knowledge of crypto � to have easy access to all of the market�s most competitive products and strategies

description: A cross-chain DAO protocol

description: Making casino games decentralized
dao_mission: Dedicated to make casino games decentralized also to make all the games trackable on its native blockchain

description: Operating system for DAOs
dao_mission: Helps in starting a DAO in seconds. They with provide an easy step-by-step process to start, manage, and grow a decentralized autonomous organization.

description: Helping Solana projects launch & grow.
dao_about: They help the most promising projects in the Solana ecosystem in the ascending world launch and grow. They are organized as a co-operative of creatives, operators, and investors who are experienced in launching and growing technology businesses.

description: Community owned fashion house
dao_mission: Decentralized fashion house

description: Sponsoring web3 talents
dao_about: Scholarship DAO helped assisting with their expertise in web3 companies in their early phases. They believe in strong communities and feel that they will have a bright future in the web3 sector.

description: Learn-to-earn DAO that creates incentive structures for members to upskill themselves.
dao_mission: ScribeDAO is a crypto content curator community aiming to lower the barrier to entry to crypto by making information easily digestible. The community is devoted to synthesizing and creating simplified content on web3 for crypto newcomers and veterans alike.
dao_about: ScribeDAO is a learn-to-earn DAO that establishes incentive structures for committed Web3 community members to progress from content readers to content synthesisers and finally to content creators.

description: Token farming tool
Builds up Ethereum profile with anonymised attestations created from your other accounts
dao_about: Sismo issues badges (non-transferable NFTs) to your public Ethereum profiles (ENS names). They are Zero-Knowledge (ZK) attestations of facts imported from your other accounts (Ethereum accounts as well as twitter or github). You can aggregate your reputation, with confidentiality, to your public profile.

description: Global web3 community around a shared passion for skiing + snowboarding
dao_about: skiDAO is building a global ski club for the decentralized era + doing mountains of good along the way. With a charitable DAO at its core, skiDAO combines the best of web3 communities, DAOs, NFTs and decentralized innovation to bring the ski industry back to its former glory.

description: Hardware-enabled DAO that bundles multi-layered hardware & software tools on top of Polkadot
dao_about:
The first hardware-governed DAO with a self-maintaining and self-improving robust Hardware/Software Governance control mechanism

SpiderDAO is a next generation hardware-based DAO governance
model that aims to bring a new standard of fairness to existing DAO frameworks.

description: The first-ever event-based DAO, running the annual ETHDenver conference.
dao_about: SporkDAO is the first-ever event-based DAO, running the annual ETHDenver conference. It represents the final leg of transitioning ETHDenver to a community owned ecosystem.SporkDAO is a member-owned community.

description: Cross-chain asset factory, enabling the vibrant future of decentralized finance
dao_about: StakerDAO governance is run by a community of blockchain and finance enthusiasts who govern decisions for building cross-chain, decentralized financial assets in a compliant manner.

description: Building the world's largest network of digital nomad communities
dao_about: StayDAO's goal is to expand the network by leasing or purchasing as many sites as possible while keeping costs low for our members. They'll concentrate on reusing existing workplaces, retail properties, and hotels in a sustainable manner.

description: Building non-custodial solution that enables to create unstoppable cash flows from DeFi returns.
dao_about: SyncDAO is developing a non-custodial method for users to generate unstoppable cash flows from DeFi returns. Users are looking for crypto assets that generate money. When users deposit stablecoins, Perpetual Vaults will establish unstoppable income streams for them. By combining numerous tactics that generate income/yields, a Perpetual Vault can achieve high DeFi APYs.

description: Buidling a borderless financial system
dao_about: ShapeShift is the only cryptocurrency trading platform offering zero-commission crypto trading and self-custody. ShapeShift.com allows users to buy crypto with fiat, trade, track, and secure their crypto through a simple and beautiful web interface. Users always stay in control of their keys.

description: Fully functional & profitable digital colony
dao_mission: mission at Stakeborg is to be an education-first vehicle that empowers retail investors to pursue financial prosperity.
dao_about: The Stakeborg DAO will support the community in becoming a decentralized DeFi & DAO Think Tank that will generate meaningful contributions to these highly important fields of the web 3.0 ecosystem.

description: The Goldman Sachs of DeFi

Offers a range of strategic DeFi investment products which allocate capital based on Machine Learning and quantitative methods.
Goal is to further the democratization of financial services by bringing innovative and exciting financial products to every DeFi user in the world.

The Trojan DAO is an art organisation administered by its members, who are always in charge of deciding how the group's revenues are dispersed.
They collaborate to organise and support art events, exhibitions, actions, and more using the Trojan DAO as a platform.

description: Establish an open platform to promote conversations and support a system.

TeslaCapital is a global open source platform for decentralized applications.TeslaCapital seeks to make the most of blockchain while leaving a small carbon impact, based on the proof-of-stake consensus.

TeslaCapital is run by the community and is not controlled by anyone.

description: Building infrastructure for decentralization

description: Building a multi-vault investment pool that allows users to customize their risk exposure
dao_about: A place to grow your bags while you sleep easy in the Temple.

We gather significant digital artefacts that will be conserved and made available to the public.

dao_about: UFOstart is a community-sourced, data-driven marketing robo advisor that helps startups to find their marketing strategy

description: collective of designers in crypto

description: Fair distribution
dao_mission: The X will be the first currency in history with a fair distribution. It can be used as a medium of exchange, governance token, or purely for speculation however its main purpose is to compete with centralized currencies like bitcoin/usd/yuan.

description: Community that will provide communication and marketing support to the DeFi world
dao_about: YAP DAO is a community that provides public relations and communications support to the DeFi world. It is a service marketplace for non-technical people to get work in a technical field.

description: Fair finance by the people, for the people.
dao_mission: Yam is a decentralised autonomous organisation (DAO) that provides a variety of DeFi services in order to foster an open and inclusive society. DAO House is a treasury management solution for DAOs, while Yam Synths is a portal to synthetic derivatives. Yam Protection creates Ethereum-native protocol protection.

dao_mission: YoursDAO is a DAO database platform that connects people who wish to work for a DAO with DAOs who are looking to hire exceptional individuals. This idea arose from my frustration with donating to dozens of DAOs.
